title: Falcon Watch Face
summary: Interactive Watch Face for Android Wear with premium design.

descriptionHTML:
★★★Interactive Watch Face for Android Wear!★★★
Falcon is a modern and interactive watch face for Android Wear devices.

Falcon Watch Face brings to your watch unforgettable look with it's modern and sharp design, while keeping in mind the true intention of smart watches. Every detail is a representation of professional design.

IMPORTANT: In order Weather to update - GPS and/or Internet/Wi-Fi should be turned ON on your handheld device! Works perfect with Location in battery saving mode!

COMPATIBLE WITH:
Falcon - perfectly works on all Android Wear devices, get the fast and smooth experience with our watch faces.
- All Android Wear devices: Moto 360 ( moto360 ), Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm ), LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu ), Huawei Watch, LG G Watch R ( lgwr ), LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg ), Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 ), Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 ), Samsung Gear Live
- Round and Square smartwatches
- Not compatible with Samsung Gear (not Android OS)

Features of Falcon:

★ Date
★ Time
★ Day of the Week
★ Month
★ Choose your design colors
★ Interactive mode: tap the watch face logo to change the colors randomly
★ Digital time
★ Analog time
★ Watch battery
★ Mobile battery
★ Weather
★ Step count
★ Stopwatch
★ Ambient mode
★ Mobile handheld companion app for customization
★ Preview screen while changing styles/colors on mobile device


Customize your Falcon:

★ Choose any color you want with color picker that perfectly match your style on mobile device
★ Choose between 12 / 24 hour mode
★ Use stopwatch to track your short term actions
★ Step count gives you daily total steps count!
★ Pick your Weather unit: C / F
★ Determine weather refresh periodicity
★ Turn On/Of Interactivity
★ Show/Hide digital watch

Interactivity of watch face added:
★ Tap the Falcon logo on watch face to change the colors randomly!
★ Tap the weather or steps to change them
★ Tap the digital clock to change it to stopwatch

Step count:
★Steps will be automatically synced over a period of time, if steps lost after connecting to your phone, don't worry, they will be synchronized after a while. Steps work through HISTORY_API.★

★SUPPORT:
Please, if you have trouble with the app in sort of any kind, send us an email before submitting a bad review. We would solve the issue instantly 24/7.
Our e-mail: devkarat@gmail.com ★

INSTALLATION
How do I install the watch face on Android Wear 1. ?
Automatically will be installed from your phone when your watch get paired, sometimes it needs a little longer time, please be patient.
And If it doesn't, follow steps:
1. After install open Android Wear App --> Settings --> and run 'Re-sync app' from the Android Wear app, wait at least 10 minutes.
2. Long press your watch and choose Falcon as your watch face, or select the watch face using the Android Wear app.
3.And if it doesn't show up again please restart you phone and watch, then pair again.

How do I install the watch face on Android Wear 2.0?
1. Install the companion app from Google Play Store on your phone.
2. Turn WiFi, open Google Play Wear Store on your watch, scroll down, you will see watchfaces that need to be installed, then install.

★IF YOU WANT MORE WATCH FACES LIKE THIS:
Follow us on:
Google+ - https://plus.google.com/101125851591882030939
Twitter - https://twitter.com/KaratWatchFaces
Facebook - https://web.facebook.com/Android-Wear-Watch-Faces-and-Apps-751655621634986

#watchface #androidwear #falcon #android #watch #face #moto360 #moto
comments: Looks good, but stopwatch unusable I really like the design. Unfortunately the stopwatch pauses when entering ambient mode, which makes it useless.
I h ave a new Pioneer smart watch AT&T.   Couldn't  the app to load. Very  disappointing.
Very Nice One more Superb watchface .. simply loved this one too.. Thanks..
Looks great, just got the update too. Nice Work
recentChanges: Thanks to all my friends who tested this watch face on their devices!
- Changed font sizes of digital time to fit correctly in all devices
